content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "redstone", "quantity": 50, "index": 12}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 6, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 42, "index": 35}]

thought: To craft cyan_carpet, I first need to craft white_carpet. White_carpet requires placing 2 white_wool side by side in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the white_wool from slot 16 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 50, "index": 12}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 5, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 42, "index": 35}]

thought: Since the first white_wool has been moved into the crafting grid, I now need to move the second white_wool to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the white_wool to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: cyan_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 3, "index": 0}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "redstone", "quantity": 50, "index": 12}, {"type": "feather", "quantity": 4, "index": 13}, {"type": "white_wool", "quantity": 4, "index": 16}, {"type": "cyan_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "green_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 29}, {"type": "emerald_ore", "quantity": 42, "index": 35}]
thought: Now I can craft the white_carpet by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 3

Ok
act: move from slot 16 to slot 1 with quantity 1
